p: The inhibitory activity of C. taxifolium EO against BChE showed an IC 50 value of 31.3 ± 3.0 μg/mL; however, it was shown to be inactive against AChE (IC 50 > 250 μg/mL) ( Figure 2). These results were compared to the ones of donepezil as positive control, which showed an IC 50 value of about one order of magnitude less against BChE.
